meanings.meaning: know/tell somebody a thing or two (about somebody/something)

vlive.korean: 좀만... so I'll just taste a bit... 듣기 View video ITZY : 유나토스트 드시러 오실 분~? 🍞💕
vlive.english: so I'll just taste a bit...

vlive.korean: 그럴까요? 나 좀 만 있으면 형 라인 - 우리 다 형 하자 그냥! Ok! I'm going to be in the older line soon! - Everyone in the older line! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 즐거웠어, 2019!
vlive.english: Ok! I'm going to be in the older line soon! - Everyone in the older line!

vlive.korean: 어... 좀 만 더 가까이 갈래? Oh... Can you go closer? 듣기 View video 초등학생 관심거리연구소 (Super Cool Kids Lab) : [Epilogue] 봉인해제 13세 10개월 간의 추억
좀 만 45도로 틀어서 말해줬으면 좋겠어 - 왜요? I wish you can speak to me at 45 degree angle. - Why? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] B.I.G GUNMIN X HEEDO X LieV - 비아이지 건민X희도의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: I wish you can speak to me at 45 degree angle. - Why?

vlive.korean: [오늘 녹음의 디렉터 백호!] 민기야 발음을 좀 만 더 흐리멍텅 하게 가자. [Today's recording director is Baekho!] Ren, let's try to pronounce it a little more hazy. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] L.O.Λ.E RECORD B-Side EP.11 WHO, YOU 컴백 준비 비하인드
vlive.english: [Today's recording director is Baekho!] Ren, let's try to pronounce it a little more hazy.
